name: Sarwar Jahan's Personal Website
description: Sarwar Jahan's Personal Website is a Progressive Web App (PWA) that allows users to access Sarwar Jahan's website on their mobile or desktop devices. The PWA provides a seamless user experience, with features such as offline access, push notifications, and app-like interface. Users can browse Sarwar Jahan's blog posts, view his portfolio, and get in touch with him through the contact form.
